Text.Page:
So... we meet again.

During the teleportation, I noticed my horn had been broken. Then I completely lost myself. Of course, the teleportation failed, too.

That's how those red fellas got me again.

Don't worry. I will escape on my own this time.

You noticed the electric laser?
You need a counter measure. Like something that grants you lightning resistance. If not, you're toast.

I've had that happen, and I don't want to repeat the experience."You need get out. Now.""Don't worry."

I will be on my way.
I hope our paths cross again.

If so, drinks are on me."I will look forward to it."
